lead_paragraph: The 37-year-old Toyota driver David Reutimann avoided trouble to win the caution-filled Sam’s Town 250 Busch Series race at Memphis Motorsports Park yesterday. It was Reutimann’s first Busch Series victory in 63 starts, and the owner Michael Waltrip’s first victory for Toyota. The race had a season-high 25 cautions.
